website_summaries.verdict: A well-loved baby wash from a natural skincare range that provides benefits comparable to more expensive varieties. Great value for budget-minded parents who still want the best.
pros: Natural ingredients derived from plants gently cleanse skin and hair
Vitamin B-enriched soy proteins nourish and moisturize
Subtle, natural scent leaves little ones smelling delicious
Clinically proven to be safe for everyday use
Nontoxic and free from harmful chemicals
Lathers well and creates plenty of bubbles
cons: Longtime users feel the scent of the newer, more natural formula isn't quite as good as it once was

customer_reviews.title: Gentle wash for babies and grown ups too! Pump bottle is my new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying burt's bees baby shampoo & wash for over 5 years now! I originally bought it for my newborn but started using it myself as a gentle body wash. I love that it's 99% natural ingredients, has a minimal nice smell and this pump style bottle is super convenient. I read some negative reviews prior to purchasing stating the product had been diluted. I compared my bottles consistency to the store and it looked exactly the same so I wouldn't be concerned about that issue. I recommend this style bottle if you have children as they tend to dump too much out of the pour spout type.

product_meta.title: Burt's Bees Baby Shampoo & Wash, Original, 21 Ounces (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Size:21 Fl Oz (Pack of 3)| Color:OriginalA tear free formula to naturally clean your babys sensitive skin and hair. Burts Bees Baby Shampoo & Wash is clinically shown to be gentle enough for everyday use. This naturally foaming, non irritating baby shampoo and wash is made with 98.9% natural, plant based formula containing soy proteins to leave your baby clean and smooth. Plus it is pediatrician tested and contains no phthalates, parabens, petrolatum or SLS.
feature_bullets: BABY SHAMPOO: Make bath time easy with this natural, gentle shampoo and body wash that cleanses and softens baby's delicate, sensitive skin. The perfect addition to any baby shower gift or new baby gift set!
BABY BODY WASH: Mild baby wash and tear free baby shampoo come together in one non-irritating formula to cleanse hair and skin from head to toe
NATURAL BABY CARE: This baby shampoo and body wash has a natural plant based cleansing complex with Soy Proteins that naturally moisturizes skin
FRESH CLEAN SCENT: Burt's Bees Baby Original Shampoo & Wash has a fresh scent that leaves baby's skin soft, clean, and smelling delicious
PEDIATRICIAN TESTED: Clinically proven to be safe and effective for daily use, this 98.9% natural origin baby bath essential is formulated without phthalates, parabens, petrolatum, or SLS
